newsitem.title: USA: Times Mirror bought 2.5 mln shrs in Apr-May.
newsitem.headline: Times Mirror bought 2.5 mln shrs in Apr-May.

text.p: Times Mirror Co said Thursday it bought back about 2.5 million shares of its Series A common stock in April and early May.
The aggregate cost of the repurchase was $129.8 million, the newspaper publishing company said.
During the first half of 1997, Times Mirror acquired 6.5 million Series A common shares, it said.
At the end of the second quarter of 1997, it had 95.7 million common shares outstanding.
